original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī asaṅkaccikā gāmaṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī a saṅkaccikā gāmam piṇḍāya pāvisi

original: Sā bhikkhunī tehi manussehi uppaṇḍiyamānā maṅku ahosi.
analyzed: sā bhikkhunī tehi manussehi uppaṇḍiyamānā maṅku ahosi

original: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī upassayaṁ gantvā bhikkhunīnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
analyzed: atha kho sā bhikkhunī upassayam gantvā bhikkhunīnam etam attham ārocesi

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti
katham hi nāma bhikkhunī a saṅkaccikā gāmam pavisissati iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī asaṅkaccikā gāmaṁ pāvisī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave bhikkhunī a saṅkaccikā gāmam pāvisi iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī asaṅkaccikā gāmaṁ pavisissati.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave bhikkhunī a saṅkaccikā gāmam pavisissati
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu

original: “Yā pana bhikkhunī asaṅkaccikā gāmaṁ paviseyya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī a saṅkaccikā gāmam paviseyya pācittiyanti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī iti
adhakkhakam ubbha nābhi tassa paṭicchādana tthāya

original: parikkhittassa gāmassa parikkhepaṁ atikkāmentiyā āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: parikkhittassa gāmassa parikkhepam atikkāmentiyāḥ āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṁ okkamantiyā āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: a parikkhittassa gāmassa upacāram okkamantiyāḥ āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Uddiṭṭhā kho, ayyāyo, chasaṭṭhisatā pācittiyā dhammā.
analyzed: uddiṭṭhāḥ kho ayyāyo cha saṭṭhi satā pācittiyāḥ dhammāḥ
tasmai tuṇhī evam etam dhārayāmi iti
